column5: The roadway is reportedly shut down in both directions.  Traffic diverted to Parallel Rd.

column4: Inbound Harrodsburg Rd just prior to Man O War Blvd
column5: A school bus is blocking the right lane.  School children have been safely transferred to another bus.

column4: Use added caution if traveling around school areas.
Stop as required by law for school buses that are loading or unloading.
